t: How It Works | ACX
s: Showcase your talent in your profile Whether you’re an individual narrator or a studio, your profile is how authors will find you. Include your background and experience and add vocal samples that showcase your range (like if you specialize in dialects or excel in certain genres).

t: How much can you make recording audiobooks from home? — Krystal Wascher
s: February 21, 2025 - I started working from home as a freelance audiobook narrator on ACX.com a couple of years ago. ACX is owned by Amazon and Audible and helps match narrators with authors/book publishers by allowing anyone to submit auditions for open audiobook projects.

t: The Audiobook Narrator Side Hustle
